title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Concepts of hydrologic cycle; Measurement and analysis of precipitation and runoff; Hydrograph analysis; Irrigation requirement of crops; Design of canals; Design and drawing of weirs and barrages; cross drainage works; Classification; analysis; design and drawing of Gravity and Earth dams; Design and drawing of spillways and energy dissipators.
